channel.title: How to change npc attack type? [PI 317]
channel.description: hey, i added a new godwar layer manually... and i have spawned the npc and everything.. but all of it does melee... i want it to mage,range, and melee... and i also want it to attack you once you arrive at the layer... how could i do this?
